# YouTube Playlist Length Calculator

> Calculate the total duration of any YouTube playlist instantly. Get detailed insights, playback speed estimates, and planning tools.

## Project Overview

YouTube Playlist Length Calculator is a powerful, free online tool designed to help users manage their video consumption efficiently. By simply pasting a playlist URL, users can get:
- Total duration of all videos
- Average video length
- Playback time estimates at different speeds (1.25x, 1.5x, 2x, etc.)
- Completion date planning based on daily watch time

**Website**: https://ytplaylistlength.pro

## Key Features

- **Instant Calculation**: Get total duration in seconds.
- **Playback Speeds**: See how much time you save watching at faster speeds.
- **Playlist Analysis**: Detailed breakdown of video counts, average duration, and more.
- **Active Planning**: Plan your study or entertainment schedule by setting daily watch goals.
- **Privacy Focused**: No personal data storage; calculations happen in real-time.
- **Responsive Design**: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

## Tech Stack

- **Framework**: Next.js 14
- **UI Library**: React 18
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Theme**: Dark/Light mode support via next-themes

## Site Structure

- **Home**: `/` - Main calculator interface.
- **Blog**: `/blog` - Articles and guides about YouTube tools and productivity.
- **Changelog**: `/changelog` - Version history and feature updates.
- **Tools**: `/tools-you-may-also-like` - Curated list of other useful developer tools.
- **YouTube Playlist Exporter**: `/youtube-playlist-exporter` - Tool to export playlist data to CSV/Excel.
- **About**: `/about` - Information about the project and team.
- **Contact**: `/contact` - Get in touch for support or feedback.
- **Privacy Policy**: `/privacy` - Data handling practices.
- **Terms**: `/terms` - Usage terms and conditions.

## Contact

For support or inquiries, please visit our [Contact Page](https://ytplaylistlength.pro/contact).
